Welcome to Maud’s documentation!¶

Maud is a command-line application that fits Bayesian statistical models of metabolic networks using Python and Stan.

Maud aims to take into account allosteric effects, ensure that the laws of thermodynamics are obeyed and to synthesise information from both steady state experiments and the existing literature.

How to use Maud:

  • Installation
  • Specifying input data
  • Contributing to Maud
  • Generating posterior draws

  • Computation
  • Enzyme kinetics
  • Statistical Model
  • Thermodynamics

Case studies:

  • A simple model of E. coli glycolysis
